Text.Page:
{@LinkCreature:49#21} is a potent argon—my evil opposite, if you will.

He's behind the argon assault on the Casian Tree. Killing him disrupts their activities and helps ours, while protecting our friend here.

I sense a change in our foes—and within our ancient ally. The deed is done?

Excellent.

I sense this battle is about to come to a head. Thanks to you, we're better prepared.
